item.title: 〽️ Git aliases
item.description: In order to provide a consistent development environment between team members as well as making it easier to do physical pair programming sharing a .gitconfig is a good thing to do. After all, when using another person’s machine there are few things more annoying than not having access to the same shortcuts you rely on.
